A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The eighth installment of the Skywalker saga is a feast to the eyes in which Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker\, who is uneasy by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile\, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order and it is an epic climax between good and evil. I was really surprised by all the events that took place and that I didn't expect. Its script is very good with excellent plot twists.
